name: Library of Congress: Braille And Audio Materials Service
description: Braille and audio materials and services at no cost for people who are blind or have a visual, physical, perceptual, or reading disability.
fullDescription: Braille and audio materials and services at no cost for people who are blind or have a visual, physical, perceptual, or reading disability.
